item.title: Vijay Deverakonda’s Car Hits Accident Near Gadwal, Actor Unhurt
item.description:
<![CDATA[Vijay Deverakonda’s Car Hits Accident Near Gadwal, Actor Unhurt
Entertainment
oi-Ruchika Pareek
Actor Vijay Deverakonda, 36, narrowly escaped injury after the car he was traveling in met with an accident on Monday in the Jogulamba Gadwal district of Telangana. The collision occurred on the Hyderabad-Bengaluru National Highway near Undavalli, but fortunately, the Tollywood star was unharmed.
Deverakonda was traveling from Puttaparthi in Andhra Pradesh to Hyderabad when his car was hit from be...]]>
item.author: Oi-Ruchika Pareek

item.title: Vijay Deverakonda escapes unscathed after car accident in Jogulamba Gadwala District
item.description:
<![CDATA[Actor Vijay Deverakonda had a close call on the roads near Undavalli in Jogulamba Gadwala district when his Lexus car was involved in an accident. The incident occurred when a Bolero vehicle, traveling ahead of Deverakonda's car, made a sudden right turn, causing a collision.
According to sources, Vijay was inside the car at the time of the crash but fortunately escaped without any injuries. The accident caused only minor damage to his vehicle. Authorities confirmed that the actor, along with t...]]>

item.title: Vijay Deverakonda Car Accident: Kingdom Actor Escapes Unhurt After Minor Scare In Gadwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[Vijay Deverakonda Car Accident: Kingdom Actor Escapes Unhurt After Minor Scare In Gadwal
Telugu star Vijay Deverakonda recently met with a minor accident near Undavalli in Gadwal district, which left his Lexus slightly damaged. According to reports, his car collided with another vehicle on the highway. Thankfully, neither Vijay nor his family sustained any injuries.
Vijay Deverakonda Car Accident
Reports say Vijay was travelling back to Hyderabad from Puttaparthi when the incident occurred.
...]]>

item.title: Vijay Devarakonda Narrowly Escapes Road Accident Near Gadwal, Telangana | Report
item.description:
<![CDATA[Actor Vijay Devarakonda has escaped unhurt after his car was involved in a road accident in Jogulamba Gadwal district, Telangana, on Monday. The incident reportedly occurred when he was returning to Hyderabad from Puttaparthi. As per reports, another car hit his vehicle from behind, but fortunately, no one was injured in the incident. Vijay Deverakonda has safely reached Hyderabad after this mishap.
